member.name: PROPPAGEINFO
member.summary: Contains parameters used to describe a property page to a property frame. A property page fills a caller-provided structure in the method.

member.name: PROPPAGEINFO.cb
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: PROPPAGEINFO.pszTitle
member.summary: Pointer to an that contains the string that appears in the tab for this page. The string must be allocated with . The caller of is responsible for freeing the memory with .

member.name: PROPPAGEINFO.size
member.summary: Required dimensions of the page's dialog box, in pixels.

member.name: PROPPAGEINFO.pszDocString
member.summary: Pointer to a text string describing the page, which can be displayed in the property sheet dialog box (current frame implementation doesn't use this field). The text must be allocated with . The caller of is responsible for freeing the memory with .

member.name: PROPPAGEINFO.pszHelpFile
member.summary: Pointer to an that contains the simple name of the help file that describes this property page used instead of implementing . When the user presses Help, the Help method is normally called. If that method fails, the frame will open the help system with this help file (prefixed with the value of the HelpDir key in the property page's registry entries under its CLSID) and will instruct the help system to display the context described by the dwHelpContext field. The path must be allocated with . The caller of is responsible for freeing the memory with .

member.name: PROPPAGEINFO.dwHelpContext
member.summary: Context identifier for the help topic within pszHelpFile that describes this page.
